title: Metastatic Breast Cancer Program
description: Treating patients with metastatic breast cancer (MBC) is a significant part of our practice at Dana-Farber/Brigham and Women's Breast Cancer Treatment Center. Our doctors, nurses, nutritionists, research staff, social workers, and others provide continuous care, support, and assistance.
cleaned_text: The Program for Patients with Breast Cancer Brain Metastases specializes in the treatment of patients with breast cancer that has spread to the brain. Our multidisciplinary team of internationally recognized experts includes medical oncologists, radiation oncologists, neurosurgeons, neuro-oncologists, neuroradiologists, and pathologists, who work together to provide the highest level of care.
